message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and leave you 10%.
This time, it's my turn to take 90%.  But if you're clever, you'll think about the future and accept this deal. My offer won't get any better!
I'll give you a bit more this time, but remember, the money keeps shrinking for me. If you reject this, I'll be forced to take a larger share in the future, and that won't be good for either of us.
